languages.text: Где-то на планетоиде находится сын другого могущественного Вольного Торговца, молодой Эвейн Винтерскейл. Найти его было бы хорошим политическим ходом для Лорд-капитана.
Young Evayne Winterscale, son of another mighty Rogue Trader, is somewhere on the planetoid. Finding him would be a good political move for the Lord Captain.
languages.original_text: Где-то на планетоиде находится сын другого могущественного Вольного Торговца, молодой Эвейн Винтерскейл. Найти его было бы хорошим политическим ходом для Лорд-капитана.

traits.locale_text: Young Evayne Winterscale, son of another mighty Rogue Trader, is somewhere on the planetoid. Finding him would be a good political move for the Lord Captain.
Young Evayne Winterscale, son of another mighty Rogue Trader, is somewhere on the planetoid. Finding him would be a good political move for the Lord Captain.
Young Evayne Winterscale, son of another mighty Rogue Trader, is somewhere on the planetoid. Finding him would be a good political move for the Lord Captain.

languages.text: Der junge Evayne Winterzunder, der Sohn eines anderen mächtigen Freihändlers, befindet sich irgendwo auf dem Planetoiden. Ihn zu finden, wäre ein kluger politischer Schachzug für den Lord Captain.
languages.original_text: Young Evayne Winterscale, son of another mighty Rogue Trader, is somewhere on the planetoid. Finding him would be a good political move for the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: Der junge Evayne Winterzunder, der Sohn eines anderen mächtigen Freihändlers, befindet sich irgendwo auf dem Planetoiden. Ihn zu finden, wäre ein kluger politischer Schachzug für den Lord Captain.

languages.text: Le jeune Evayne Winterscale, fils d'un autre puissant libre-marchand, se trouve quelque part sur le planétoïde. Le trouver serait, pour {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, plutôt une bonne opération sur le plan politique.
languages.original_text: Young Evayne Winterscale, son of another mighty Rogue Trader, is somewhere on the planetoid. Finding him would be a good political move for the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: Le jeune Evayne Winterscale, fils d'un autre puissant libre-marchand, se trouve quelque part sur le planétoïde. Le trouver serait, pour {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, plutôt une bonne opération sur le plan politique.

languages.text: 年轻的艾维尼·温特斯凯尔，另一位强大的行商浪人的子嗣，就在这颗行星上的某个地方。如果能找到他的话，这会对领主舰长的政治生涯带来正面影响。
languages.original_text: Young Evayne Winterscale, son of another mighty Rogue Trader, is somewhere on the planetoid. Finding him would be a good political move for the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: 年轻的艾维尼·温特斯凯尔，另一位强大的行商浪人的子嗣，就在这颗行星上的某个地方。如果能找到他的话，这会对领主舰长的政治生涯带来正面影响。

languages.text: 偉大な自由開拓者の息子、若きエヴァイン・ウィンタースケールは小惑星のどこかにいる。彼を見つけることは、ロード・キャプテンにとって好ましい政治的な動きとなるだろう。
languages.original_text: Young Evayne Winterscale, son of another mighty Rogue Trader, is somewhere on the planetoid. Finding him would be a good political move for the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: 偉大な自由開拓者の息子、若きエヴァイン・ウィンタースケールは小惑星のどこかにいる。彼を見つけることは、ロード・キャプテンにとって好ましい政治的な動きとなるだろう。

languages.text: El joven Evayne Winterscale, hijo de otro poderoso Comerciante Independiente, está en algún lugar del planetoide. Encontrarle sería una buena jugada política para {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: Young Evayne Winterscale, son of another mighty Rogue Trader, is somewhere on the planetoid. Finding him would be a good political move for the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: El joven Evayne Winterscale, hijo de otro poderoso Comerciante Independiente, está en algún lugar del planetoide. Encontrarle sería una buena jugada política para {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: Bir başka kudretli Hür Tacir'in oğlu olan genç Evayne Winterscale, cüce gezegende bir yerlerde. Onu bulmak, Lord Kaptan için faydalı bir politik hamle olabilir.
languages.original_text: Young Evayne Winterscale, son of another mighty Rogue Trader, is somewhere on the planetoid. Finding him would be a good political move for the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: Bir başka kudretli Hür Tacir'in oğlu olan genç Evayne Winterscale, cüce gezegende bir yerlerde. Onu bulmak, Lord Kaptan için faydalı bir politik hamle olabilir.
